TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CalloutAnnotation extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation

span.span: Represents a callout annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註標註解是唯一的連接和之間畫出註解位置錨點的註解。A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point. 這個類別可以也會顯示文字，並自動計算其所需的大小。This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size. 支援不同的註標樣式。Different callout styles are supported.

summary.span: 取得或設定註標線的錨點端點樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the callout line anchor cap.

value.span: 列舉值，表示用於註標線錨點端點的樣式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定，以連接註釋錨點線的錨點端點樣式。The property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point. 這個屬性時，才適用或使用註標樣式。This property is only applicable when a or callout style is used.
